actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A resolution to disapprove the proposed termination of Amtrak service on the "Montrealer" route.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of the Senate regarding the Secretary of Transportation's proposal to terminate railroad service on the "Montrealer" and requests the Secretary to withdraw such proposal. Directs the Secretary to report to the Senate on ways to make the "Montrealer" more efficient.

titles.title: A resolution to disapprove the proposed termination of Amtrak service on the "Montrealer" route.
